attributes.action: Funding for temporary drivers & staff during London transport strike action
attributes.background: London transport is a service which is frequently exploited by trade unions to secure non-market rate salaries & benefits. Until driverless trains are introduced or London travel services are reclassified as essential, there should be funding and a process to ensure continuity of transport services.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Staffing for London transport is the responsibility of Transport for London and the London Assembly. 

You could raise this issue with the London Assembly using the link below: 
https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
